benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Add custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Payload Coverage: Happy path and variations (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC21).
Boundary/Performance Coverage: Large payload (TC15) and concurrency/peak-load tests (TC19, TC22, TC23).
Error Handling Coverage: Malformed JSON (TC08), extra/unexpected fields (TC06), empty/partial payload scenarios (TC07, TC16).
Invalid Id Coverage: Invalid paymentId format (TC10), non-existent (TC11).
Header/Validation Coverage: Missing required header (TC09), optional headers (TC02).
Query Parameter Coverage: Unsupported query parameters (TC17).
Persistence/Integration Coverage: Post-create persistence (TC24) and cross-system verification (TC25).
Unicode Coverage: Unicode characters in fieldValue (TC21).
Concurrency/Performance Coverage: Concurrency (TC19), normal load (TC22), peak load (TC23).
gaps: Rate limiting/Throttling: No tests cover rate limiting or throttling on POST.
Caching Behavior: No tests checking caching headers (ETag/Cache-Control) for POST responses.
Content-Type Handling: Missing or incorrect Content-Type header (e.g., 415) not tested.
Authorization: 403 Forbidden scenarios with insufficient permissions not tested.
Internal Server Error: No test for 500 Internal Server Error (DB/service failures).
Idempotency/Duplicate Submission: No explicit test for idempotent POST behavior (duplicate submissions).
recommendations: Add a 403 Forbidden test to cover authorization beyond missing/invalid tokens.
Add a 500 Internal Server Error test to simulate DB/service failures.
Add tests for Content-Type validation (missing or wrong Content-Type; expect 415 or 400).
Add rate limiting/throttling tests under high load (TC22/TC23 context).
Add idempotency tests for repeated POST requests to verify deduplication or safe handling (no unintended duplicates).
Add tests for data-type validation (invalid types in CustomField properties).
